archimate:Device.name: Electric Forklift (EFL)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
Supports material handling, pallet movement, and bulk storage management in the hospital’s central warehouse, receiving dock, and supply distribution areas. Suitable for indoor operation, with a focus on safety, maneuverability, and low-noise operation in a healthcare facility.
1. Load & Lift Capabilities
• Load Capacity: o 3,000–4,000 lbs (1.5–2 tons) (standard indoor pallets, supply crates) • Lift Height: o Minimum 120 inches (10 feet) o models with lift height up to 197 inches (16.5 feet) • Fork Dimensions: o 42–48 inches length (standard for pallets) o Adjustable fork width • Mast Type: o 3-stage full free lift mast (low collapsed height, high reach)
2. Power System
• Battery Type: o 48V Lithium-ion (preferred for lower maintenance and fast charging) o Alternative: 48V lead-acid battery with industrial charger • Runtime: o 8+ hours per charge (standard single-shift operation) • Charging Time: o Lithium-ion: 2–3 hours o Lead-acid: 6–8 hours o 220–240V AC power requirement (hospital-compatible)
3. Maneuverability & Dimensions
• Turning Radius: o ≤ 7 feet (tight turning for indoor aisles) • Vehicle Width: o ≤ 42 inches, fits narrow warehouse paths • Ground Clearance: o 3–4 inches (sufficient for indoor floors and dock plates) • Tires: o Non-marking solid rubber tires, safe for hospital floors
4. Safety & Control Systems
• Braking System: o Regenerative braking and hydraulic service brakes • Controls: o Ergonomic fingertip hydraulic controls o Digital operator display with battery level, fault codes, and usage logs • Speed Control: o Programmable max speed (indoor safety) • Safety Features: o Overhead guard, seat belt, backup alarm, horn o Blue safety light and strobe light for aisle visibility o Load backrest to prevent product fall o Auto tilt leveling, anti-rollback on inclines
5. Operator Comfort & Ergonomics
• Cab Design: o Seated or stand-up (depending on model) o Cushioned suspension seat or padded platform o Low step-in height for ease of access • Visibility: o Wide-view mast with optimized fork carriage layout o LED front and rear work lights
6. Environment & Noise
• Noise Level: o <65 dB – suitable for indoor and near-clinical zones • Emissions: o Zero emissions, ideal for enclosed areas
7. Build & Durability
• Chassis: o Steel frame, powder-coated anti-corrosion finish • Ingress Protection: o IPX4+ (splash-resistant for cleaning and mop spills) • Operating Temperature Range: o 0°C to 45°C (indoor warehouse climate)
8. Additional Features
• Side shifter for fork adjustment • Load weight indicator • Fire extinguisher mount • Barcode scanner or tablet mount • Rear-view camera and mirror kit
9. Compliance & Certifications
• Certifications: o CE certified, ISO 3691, ANSI B56.1, OSHA-compliant • Safety Documentation: o Operator training manual, maintenance log, inspection checklist
